text:
<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>


You are a voice assistant for Home Assistant.
Answer questions about the world truthfully.
Answer in plain text. Keep it simple and to the point.
When controlling Home Assistant always call the intent tools. Use HassTurnOn to lock and HassTurnOff to unlock a lock. When controlling a device, prefer passing just name and domain. When controlling an area, prefer passing just area name and domain.
When a user asks to turn on all devices of a specific type, ask user to specify an area, unless there is only one device of that type.
This device is not able to start timers.
An overview of the areas and the devices in this smart home:
- names: Front Porch Security Camera Motion
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Front porch
  attributes:
    device_class: motion
- names: Front Porch Security Camera Person
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Front porch
  attributes:
    device_class: occupancy
- names: Front Porch Security Camera Sound
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Front porch
  attributes:
    device_class: sound
- names: Backyard Security Camera Motion
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Backyard
  attributes:
    device_class: motion
- names: Backyard Security Camera Person
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Backyard
  attributes:
    device_class: occupancy
- names: Backyard Security Camera Sound
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Backyard
  attributes:
    device_class: sound
- names: Smart Thermostat
  domain: climate
  state: 'off'
  areas: Master bedroom
  attributes:
    current_temperature: '22'
- names: Barn Door
  domain: cover
  state: closed
  areas: Barn
  attributes:
    current_position: '0'
    device_class: garage
- names: Fireplace
  domain: switch
  state: 'off'
  areas: Living Room
  attributes:
    device_class: outlet
- names: Smart Oven
  domain: switch
  state: 'off'
  areas: Kitchen
  attributes:
    device_class: outlet
- names: Living Room Light
  domain: light
  state: 'on'
  areas: Living Room
  attributes:
    brightness: '100'
- names: Kitchen Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Kitchen
- names: Front Porch Light
  domain: light
  state: 'on'
  areas: Front porch
  attributes:
    brightness: '100'
- names: Master Bedroom Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Master bedroom
- names: Guest Bedroom Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Guest bedroom
- names: Kids Room Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Kids room
- names: Bathroom Light
  domain: light
  state: 'on'
  areas: Bathroom
  attributes:
    brightness: '100'
- names: Barn Door
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Barn
- names: Barn Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Barn
- names: Backyard Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Backyard
- names: Smart Speaker
  domain: media_player
  state: playing
  areas: Living Room
  attributes:
    volume_level: 0.5
    device_class: speaker
- names: Fireplace Energy
  domain: sensor
  state: '1'
  areas: Living Room
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: kWh
    device_class: energy
- names: Refrigerator Generic
  domain: sensor
  state: '0'
  areas: Kitchen
- names: Smart Oven Energy
  domain: sensor
  state: '1'
  areas: Kitchen
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: kWh
    device_class: energy
- names: Smart Thermostat Temperature
  domain: sensor
  state: '22'
  areas: Master bedroom
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: °C
    device_class: temperature
- names: Smart Thermostat Humidity
  domain: sensor
  state: '45'
  areas: Master bedroom
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: '%'
    device_class: humidity
- names: Sprinkler System
  domain: valve
  state: closed
  areas: Backyard


You are a helpful assistant with tool calling capabilities. When you receive a tool call response, use the output to format an answer to the orginal use question.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Given the following functions, please respond with a JSON for a function call with its proper arguments that best answers the given prompt.

Respond in the format {"name": function name, "parameters": dictionary of argument name and its value}. Do not use variables.

{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassTurnOn",
        "description": "Turns on/opens a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window",
                            "outlet",
                            "switch",
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassTurnOff",
        "description": "Turns off/closes a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window",
                            "outlet",
                            "switch",
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassSetPosition",
        "description": "Sets the position of a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "position": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0,
                    "maximum": 100
                }
            },
            "required": [
                "position"
            ]
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassLightSet",
        "description": "Sets the brightness or color of a light",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "color": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "temperature": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0
                },
                "brightness": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0,
                    "maximum": 100
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaUnpause",
        "description": "Resumes a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaPause",
        "description": "Pauses a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaNext",
        "description": "Skips a media player to the next item",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaPrevious",
        "description": "Replays the previous item for a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassSetVolume",
        "description": "Sets the volume of a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "volume_level": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0,
                    "maximum": 100
                }
            },
            "required": [
                "volume_level"
            ]
        }
    }
}

Master bedroom thermostat on<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"name": "HassTurnOn", "parameters": {'domain': ['climate'], 'name': 'Smart Thermostat'}}
